entry.title: 9-1-1 What's Your Emergency?
entry.summary:
Author: Duckkey

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,345Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 164

Summary: When Buck moved to LA he was following a true purpose: He was going to be a firefighter for the LAFD. He put in the work, the studying the training, all to have that dream ripped away from him a month before graduating the academy. Buck needed to adjust his path finding himself working as a 9-1-1 Emergency Dispatcher in attempt to answer the calling that brought him to LA.Buck still manages to find family with the 118.~When Bobby asked what made him decide on firefighting Buck attempted to doge the question, "You're gonna laugh.""Try me," Bobby shrugged."I saw a movie," Buck answered. Bobby snorted."I told you."Bobby smiled, "You just seem the type. You see a cool stunt on TV?"Buck resisted the urge to sneer a bit while he defended himself, "No. Well, I mean. Okay, yeah, the stunts were cool but I really liked the brotherhood, you know?"Bobby lifted an eyebrow. Buck corrected, "Or, siblinghood, whatever. The team. Having people have my back, it was a nice thought."Bobby hummed, "You're really caught up on this whole team stuff, huh?"Buck flashed a teasing grin, "So just my luck I get a loner mentor."

entry.title: Growing Pains
entry.summary:
Author: TheCaptain42

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,282Chapters: 12/14Kudos: 188

Summary: Chris and Eddie are still working to regain trust. Chris isn't ready to come home yet. But he calls his dad with big news.*“Dad…”, Chris sighed, “Izzy’s my boyfriend.”*---Chris comes out as bi while in Texas. In the aftermath Eddie finally reflects his own past and future relationships. Maybe it's finally time to open the lid to the box of trauma Eddie had previously tidied so neatly away. Maybe it's time to reckon with the loss of Shannon, with his childhood in El Paso and why nothing ever quite works out for him. Buck is nothing but helpful of course. It's the year of gay awakenings.----(Mostly) Canon Compliant until season 8 ep 08 (though distinct lack of bees due to work-life balance) - this is a fic accompanying Eddie's character development in season 8

entry.title: Too Soon To Tell You (I Love You, I'm Sorry)
entry.summary:
Author: LA BALENA (greenLar_333)

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,759Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 5

Summary: "You’re just not used to the LA craziness anymore. I’m telling you. You’ve been gone for way too long, you’re starting to forget” The instance the words left his lips he regretted them. He could see the spark disappear out of Eddie’s eyes for a second. It didn’t last long but it was still long enough for Buck to feel his heart aching again.OrAfter a long phone call with Eddie, Buck just can't go to sleep.--I wrote this fanfic after 8x13 came out and I'm now stress-posting this, since Eddie will be back in this weeks episode

entry.title: Little Do You Know
entry.summary:
Author: salenora

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 30,075Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 209

Summary: Post Lawsuit.Buck returns to the 118 and is basically invisible to the 118 for months. He plans to end his life but when Sam and Dean Winchester show up saying they have a lead in his husbands death, he puts his suicidal thoughts on hold, and takes off with the Winchesters to get revenge on the thing that killed his husband 5 years ago.But what happens when he forgot that he left a pre suicide scene at his apartment in the rush to leave? What happens when the 118 don’t know about his past life and have no idea what’s going on?

entry.title: The Wrong Buckley
entry.summary:
Author: FeatherForARose

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,675Chapters: 5/6Kudos: 169

Summary: Buck cautiously peers into the small opening, catching a glimpse of Eddie staring at himself in the mirror, fingers gripping the edge of the porcelain sink as he shakes his head and says, “I can’t believe I’m in love with a Buckley.”It's a miracle Buck doesn’t pass out on the spot.He takes a stumbling step back into Eddie’s room, somehow managing to close the door quietly in his haze. Although it’s entirely possible that he just slammed it because he can’t hear anything over the whooshing in his ears.He doesn’t know how he didn’t see it before.Eddie is in love with Maddie.-:-:-:-:-:-Or, 5 times Buck thinks Eddie is in love with Maddie, +1 time he's sure he's not.

entry.title: the sign on your heart
entry.summary:
Author: bvckley

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,846Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 45

Summary: “Okay, sure. No checking memories then. But you can still do something, right? Like, I dunno. Intervene. Send a message. Keep them apart.”“You can do it yourself. You have a phone.”“Well, I use it as much as I can and it still wasn’t enough,” he says. Sophia just pouts at that, a not really my problem type of expression, and it sends frown off Eddie's face. He leans closer over the table and holds his hands together in between them. “Please, Sophia, I’ll owe you.”“The thing is,” she says after a second of thought. “Whatever you want to do—it won’t work if you don’t believe.”“Okay. Let’s say I’ll believe,” he offers, earning an eyebrow raise from Sophia. “This one time.” or; When Eddie learns about Buck’s hookup, there’s only one logical solution he can come up with—turn to his sister, a witch, and beg her to teach him how to curse someone. Realizations ensue.
